name: Henry Davis
user_review: I bought this vehicle just one month back and I had already driven more than 3000 kms on it. Driving a Kawasaki Ninja ZX-14R is really awesome.

name: Winston Nelson
user_review: Two years since I have been using this beauty, and I have only praises to sing for it. The bike churns raw power at 1200cc. The thrust is unlike any other sports bike available in the market.

name: Lauren Santora
user_review: Kawasaki Ninja H2R is fun to drive. Its great looks and design makes it more appealing than its rivals. This bike is truly a monster when it comes to its power and capabilities.

name: Kerry Yin
user_review: The side profile is one of the best designed parts in terms of looks. The engine is quite smooth and braking system is quite efficient.

name: Joseph Manuel
user_review: The bike will never disappoint you when it comes to stylish and looks. The bike is brilliantly finished. A green color Kawasaki Ninja looks stunning and aggressive as well.

name: Erin Vann
user_review: I bought this vehicle just 4 days ago and it is hard to believe that I have already driven more than 1500 kms on it. Driving a Kawasaki Ninja H2R is a pure fun.
